summary: A repressed, middle-aged divorced U.S. Greek meets a young singer through a dating service and becomes smitten.
cast: Paul Dooley|Marta Heflin|Titos Vandis|Belita Moreno|Henry Gibson|Dimitra Arliss|Allan F. Nicholls|Ann Ryerson|Poppy Lagos|Dennis Franz|Margery Bond|Mona Golabek|Terry Wills|Susan Blakeman|Melanie Bishop|Fred Beir|Jette Seear|Ted Neeley|Heather MacRae|Tommie Lee Bradley|Steven Sharp|Tony Berg|Craig Doerge|Jeff Eyrich|Michael Charles Hill|David Luell|Tom Pierson|Butch Sanford|Art Wood|Renn Woods
title: Una pareja perfecta... por computadora
